snippet.title: Potty Painter ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
Amidar clone and honestly it's not too bad really, I mean if you love Amidar this is worth a go but try Painter by A'n'F Software as it is a much better clone than this.

In fact here is Painter to refresh your memory - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sa8oBi0nofY
